comment: Professor Irizarry has been at Georgia Tech for some time, and is now a higher up in the Architecture Department. His Construction Tech 1 class was very easy as long as long as you did the work.  I don't know why everyone was hating on him in the earlier RMP, he must have changed. He is really nice and caring. The class should be 1 credit not 3.
Good teacher if you can keep up with him. Works fast and expects you to learn fast. If you want to take a class with him go to GA Tech, cause he is no longer at SPSU.

Horrible teacher, never take this teacher for any course if possible.  He gives absolutely ridiculous homework assignments that is nearly impossible for a working student to complete.  He has a very bad attitude.
He is one of the good one in CMD

Could have been a nice class. He is very very impatient and if you don't understand with one explanation than he gets overtly frustrated.  He picks petty things for test questions. I felt like he wants you to do poorly.  His class was just an overall poor learning environment. Take some one else!
If you don't understand how to do something and want clarity he'll tell you to go read a book to learn it.  There is no sence in learn how to use a Mac or video equip. for this class.
He is very short tempered and treats his students like children.  He has no patience for those that don't get it on the first explaination.

He is a stickler for anything and everything. He states the obvious and is so hung up on technology in classes that are non-tech. based. He can not teach for****. He is extremely annoying and not a favorite among the students
Show up to class, do the labs during class and you will get an A.  No homework and the tests are pretty easy.  You might have to study an hour for the 2 tests.
New format of class, show up, do the assignments. Tests are not hard. Irizarry was actually fun in this one. Much better than the last class I had with him.
Do not take this class unless you understand gibberish and no help. Bad professor. do not recommend.
Powerpoint presentations are worthless. Group project WAY to much effort for this class. Take it with anybody else.
easy class, does everything on powerpoint, hard to ask him for help, usually get a B in the class
